We just launched our new KVM servers powered by NVMe storage. Mix and match and create your own plan, starting at $3.50/month!

Starter Plan

  • 10 GB NVMe Storage (up to 80 GB)
  • 1 GB RAM (up to 8 GB)
  • 1 CPU Core (up to 8 Cores)
  • 1 TB Bandwidth on 1 Gbps (up to 5 TB)
  • IPv6 upon request
  • DirectAdmin License Available (+$5/month)
  • California, USA (Test IP: 104.149.18.203)

Build your own plan here!

We also have storage boxes available. Storage Boxes are KVM VPSes with high storage, perfect for storing files and other backups.

SB1TCA

  • 1 TB SAS Storage
  • 5 TB Monthly Bandwidth on 1 Gbps
  • 1 CPU Core
  • 1 GB RAM
  • California, USA (Test IP: 104.149.18.203)
  • Only $7/mo

Order now: Storage Boxes (USA) | TeraDelta

Other storage plans (2 TB @ $11/mo and 3 TB @ $15/mo) also available.

About Us

We have been serving our clients since 2019, and we offer cPanel & DirectAdmin-based web hosting and KVM-based servers with cryptocurrency support.

We support PayPal, Credit Card and Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Litecoin, XRP, Monero).

For any questions, feel free to submit a support ticket.
